scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc && babel dist/mocks.js --out-file dist/mocks.js && uglifyjs dist/mocks.js -mco dist/mocks.js
scripts.publish:patch: git checkout master && git pull && yarn version --patch && yarn publish --non-interactive && git push
scripts.publish:minor: git checkout master && git pull && yarn version --minor && yarn publish --non-interactive && git push
scripts.publish:major: git checkout master && git pull && yarn version --major && yarn publish --non-interactive && git push
